body_html:
Well, nothing much seems to have changed after updating conda. After the update, as far as what conda tells me what packages will be updated, pytorch or torchvision do not seem to want to be updated but others do. I can't really do those updates now, though, as I am running stuff on the current build of pytorch, so I'll ask later if the problem persists once I can upgrade those other packages, I guess.

I couldn't see any update procedures on pytorch.org, just installation ones.

body:
Well, nothing much seems to have changed after updating conda. After the update, as far as what conda tells me what packages will be updated, pytorch or torchvision do not seem to want to be updated but others do. I can't really do those updates now, though, as I am running stuff on the current build of pytorch, so I'll ask later if the problem persists once I can upgrade those other packages, I guess.

I couldn't see any **update** procedures on pytorch.org, just installation ones.
